veranda.title: Veranda
veranda.description: Modern and stylish verandas custom-made for your home and garden. Our verandas provide extra living space and protection from the elements all year round.
longDescription: A veranda is an elegant extension of your living space that allows you to enjoy your garden and terrace longer. Our verandas are custom-made and perfectly match the architecture of your home.

With a veranda, you create a pleasant space that offers protection from rain, wind, and UV radiation while maintaining the connection with the outdoors. It's the ideal place to relax, entertain guests, or simply enjoy the view of your garden in all seasons.

faqs.question: How long does the installation of a veranda take?
faqs.answer: The installation of a standard veranda takes an average of 2-3 working days, depending on the size and complexity of the project.

faqs.question: Do I need a building permit for a veranda?
faqs.answer: This depends on the size of the veranda and local regulations. In many cases, a permit is not required, but we can advise you on this and help with the application if needed.

faqs.question: Can I add side walls to my veranda later?
faqs.answer: Yes, our verandas are modularly designed, so you can easily add glass sliding walls or screens later.

carport.title: Carport
carport.description: Durable carports that protect your car from weather conditions and UV radiation. The open structure provides an airy appearance that matches any home.
longDescription: A carport is the ideal solution for those who want to protect their car from weather and wind without building a fully enclosed garage.
Our carports provide optimal protection against rain, snow, hail, and UV radiation, while the open structure creates a spacious feeling.
The modern, sleek design of our aluminum carports perfectly matches both traditional and modern homes.
Additionally, they are low-maintenance and very durable, ensuring you enjoy your investment for years to come.
features: Easy to install on various surfaces
Various sizes possible for one or multiple cars
Can be combined with LED lighting
Custom solutions possible for specific situations

faqs.question: Do I need a building permit for a carport?
faqs.answer: This depends on the size and location of the carport, and local regulations. We can advise you on this and help with the permit application if needed.

faqs.question: Can a carport be installed as a freestanding structure?
faqs.answer: Yes, our carports can be either attached to the house or installed as freestanding structures, depending on your wishes and the situation.

faqs.question: How are carports anchored?
faqs.answer: Carports can be anchored in different ways, depending on the surface. On concrete surfaces, anchors are used, while special foundation feet are applied for soft surfaces such as grass or sand.
